testcase.name: testISNUMBER
testcase.whyIgnoreSql: Sqlite3 treats numbers very very leniently

testcase.name: testAbsUsesExp
testcase.whyIgnoreSql: Spanner's jdbc decimal limit of 38 is absolute, not relative, so Exp(110) breaks

testcase.name: testTruncUsesExp
testcase.whyIgnoreSql: Trunc unimplemented, and has overflow issues

testcase.name: testTruncUsesLn
testcase.whyIgnoreSql: Trunc unimplemented, and has overflow issues

testcase.name: testTruncUsesTruncMinus
testcase.whyIgnoreSql: Trunc unimplemented, and has overflow issues

testcase.name: testTruncUsesIf
testcase.whyIgnoreSql: Trunc unimplemented, and has overflow issues

testcase.name: testSqrtUsesExp
testcase.whyIgnoreSql: Spanner's jdbc limit of 38 is absolute, not relative, so Exp(110) breaks

testcase.name: testModRounding
testcase.whyIgnoreSql: TODO: H2 literal numbers have BigDecimal fixed scale

testcase.name: testArcTan2
testcase.whyIgnoreSql: Divide by zero yields null not 0
